title: Trouble downloading the game.
body: I play league of legends back in the philippines using garena so im not entirely sure whats going on here. anyway  i'm currently downloading the game files using the LoL client, but the game file size is over **15GB** with the speed of **400kbps** (and its getting lower) it will took me **593** minutes to download the entire thing. is there other any way to download the game. also i'm little bit worried i was once made in it on 49% **but my internet restarted so the client, went back into 0% without saving the downloaded file.** if that happens again i'm done!

replies.body: That's usually a sure sign that something is actually stopping the client from downloading. Whether that be a firewall, or another background program! Let's run through these steps in our [Permissions Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104) and it should annihilate the issue and
it restarted, 29% to 0%! again wasted 3gb of internet data. i'm done
